titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the tariffs on ethanol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
6/4/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of ethanol used as fuel.
